mapper.select: select TBLL.bo_no, TBLL.bo_title, TBLL.bo_date, TBLL.bo_likes, TBLL.user_nick from (select ROWNUM RWNM, TBL.* from (select * from tbl_board inner join tbl_user on tbl_board.user_id = tbl_user.user_id where bo_category=#{bo_category} order by bo_no DESC) TBL) TBLL where RWNM between (#{page} - 1)*10 + 1 and #{page}*10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(bo_title, bo_content, bo_file, bo_date, prod_code, item, user_id, bo_likes, buy_date, bo_category) values(#{bo_title},#{bo_content},#{bo_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR},SYSDATE,#{prod_code},#{item},#{user_id},#{bo_likes, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{buy_date},#{bo_category})
mapper.select: select tbl_board.bo_no, tbl_board.bo_title, tbl_board.bo_content, tbl_board.bo_file, tbl_board.bo_date, tbl_uesr.user_nick, tbl_board.bo_likes from tbl_board inner join tbl_uesr on tbl_board.user_id = tbl_user.user_id where bo_no=#{bo_no}
